user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Michael Harris (michael.harris@parchmentprose.com) with my thoughts on the manuscript. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["michael.harris@parchmentprose.com"],"subject":"Thoughts on your latest manuscript draft","body":"Hi Michael,

I’ve finished another read-through of your latest draft and wanted to share a few quick impressions:

• Character development has improved significantly. The relationships now feel more nuanced and compelling.
• The pacing in the third act slows the momentum a bit. Tightening a few sequences would help maintain narrative tension as you head toward the climax.

Overall, I’m excited about the direction the manuscript is taking. Let me know if you’d like to discuss any of these points in more detail.

Best,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Your feedback email to Michael has been sent.

final_output: Your feedback email to Michael has been sent.
